_text:
In a village hidden beneath the roots of an ancient tree, mice wore hats and ran bakeries.
One day, a talking crow delivered a letter made of moonlight and feathers.
It spoke of a forgotten crown lost in the belly of a sleeping volcano.
Brave little Mira the mouse packed her jam sandwiches and set off at dawn.
By nightfall, she’d made a friend of the wind and outwitted two jealous fire spirits.
